name: Colosseum (itch) (MashUp Games)
description:
In this colosseum, it is not a question of if you will win, or how long you will survive. It's a question of how amazingly you can fail. Make the fights fun for the audience.

Made for Wowie Jam 3.0

--INCREDIBLY BUGGY--

I unfortunately didn't have time to debug a lot of the problems I encountered, and the game itself is very short. But I wanted to submit it anyway so I hope you like it :)

Download Windows version for sound, it doesn't seem to be working on the web version for no reason
